column5: Im in Western Canada but fish NW Ontario. Can anyone estimate ice out dates for Whitefish Lk. or Arrow Lk?
http://www.tomahawkresort.ca/ReginaBayCamera.cfmCheck out the webcam, plus they have an ice-out blog! They were reporting 16 inches of ice on LOW. Spring is coming... very slowly!
1-3" of snow predicted for northern Ill tonight ...WTF!!!
still 24-30 inches. just got 10 inches of snow. winter wont leave. ice out will be into second week of may?

Fishman10, which lake are you reporting on? Now that spring at least according to the calendar,is here, we are all patiently waiting(?) for ice-out reports on our favorite lakes! I still have to wait until June before we head North, but tracking the weather, ice and lake levels seem to help with the wait!
